metadata.Title: CVE-2018-21016 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
audio_sample_entry_AddBox() at isomedia/box_code_base.c in GPAC 0.7.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-21016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
gpac-modules-base - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
libgpac11 - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
